abstract: James B Stewart Common Sense column examines annual National Assn of College and University Business Officers-Commonfund study on endowment performance; report finds smallest endowments with under $25 million had better returns than biggest endowments; says top performers were Southern Virginia University and Radford University.

headline.print_headline: In College Endowments, the Davids Beat the Goliaths
headline.main: In College Endowment Returns, Davids Beat the Goliaths

keywords.value: National Assn of College and University Business Officers
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: In the latest Nacubo-Commonfund study, endowments under $25 million averaged a five-year annualized return of 10.6 percent versus 10.4 in the $1 billion-plus category.
lead_paragraph: In the latest Nacubo-Commonfund study, endowments under $25 million averaged a five-year annualized return of 10.6 percent versus 10.4 in the $1 billion-plus category.
